snippet.title: Rendering Ranger R2 Longplay (SNES) [60 FPS]
snippet.description:
Follow me on Twitter @ https://twitter.com/Al82_Retro
Support me on Patreon @ https://www.patreon.com/Al82Retro
Get Great Retro Scene News @ http://www.vintageisthenewold.com
Developed by Rainbow Arts and published by Virgin Interactive in 1995

Designed and programmed by Manfred Trenz, Rendering Ranger is a stunning visu showcase for the SNES, often feeling more like a demoscene production than a game 

If you've played Turrican or Katakis then this is pretty much a mashup of both games. It was released exclusively in Japan, which might explain some of the design choices.

TAS recording

#retrogames
#snes
#manfredtrenz
